name: intrinsics::simd::simd_extract_dyn

ptr::const_ptr::<impl *const T>::cast.doc: Casts to a pointer of another type.

ptr::const_ptr::<impl *const T>::read.doc:
Reads the value from `self` without moving it. This leaves the
 memory in `self` unchanged.

 See [`ptr::read`] for safety concerns and examples.

 [`ptr::read`]: crate::ptr::read()

doc:
Extracts an element from a vector.

 `T` must be a vector with element type `U`.

 If the index is `const`, [`simd_extract`] may emit better assembly.

 # Safety

 `idx` must be in-bounds of the vector.
